question: 1 (c)
sols_html:
We want

\[\begin{aligned} 0&=\frac{1}{b}\int_0^b(x-1)dx\\ 0&=\frac{1}{b}(\frac{x^2}{2}-x)|_0^b\\ 0&=\frac{b^2}{2}-b\\ b&=\frac{b^2}{2}\\ 2b&=b^2\end{aligned}\]

Since \(b > 0,\) we can divide both sides by \(b\) to find \(b=2.\)
